LanguageData.koisama.Numbers.Title: Numbers overview
LanguageData.Numbers_ColumnHeader_Tooltip: Right click to remove column. Click and drag to move.
LanguageData.Numbers_SetAsDefaultExplanation:
Set the current view as the default for this type of view ({0}).

This view will then be used for new colonies.

Can be deleted in the mod settings:
 [Menu] => [Options] => [Mod settings] => [Numbers].
LanguageData.Numbers_NoDefaultStoredForThisView: There are no defaults stored for the currently viewed pawn type.
LanguageData.Numbers_showMoreInfoThanVanilla: Show needs and jobs even where it would normally be hidden.
LanguageData.Numbers_coolerThanTheWildlifeTab: Numbers is everything I ever wanted from the Wildlife tab and I want it to take over.
LanguageData.Numbers_coolerThanTheAnimalTab: Numbers is everything I ever wanted from the Animal tab as well and I want it to take over.
LanguageData.Numbers_maxTableHeight: Maximum height of the Numbers window relative to your screensize.
LanguageData.Numbers_pawnTableClickSelect: Mouse clicks in pawn tables select them. (Alt-click to work as before)
LanguageData.Numbers_pawnTableClickSelect_Desc: Should behave intuitively like any other selection. Press Esc to close the tab window.\n\nShift-click to select/deselect multiple. Double click to center camera. Right-click to select a single pawn. Alt-click to close window, select and go to that one pawn. Note: Applies to *all* PawnTables, not just Numbers.
LanguageData.Numbers_pawnTableHighSelected_Desc: Note: Applies to *all* PawnTables, not just Numbers.
